farce.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: an event or a situation that is very badly organized or does not happen properly, in a way that is silly and unreasonable
farce.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: She admitted that the interview had been a complete farce from start to finish.
farce.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a humorous play or film in which the characters are involved in complicated and silly situations, or the style of writing or acting that is used
